original_title: Voices of our Time - Grace Bumbry
overview: Bumbry with accompanist Helmut Deutsch performs works by Schubert, Brahms, Liszt, Berlioz, Schumann, Strauss, Obradors, and Bizet live in Paris in memory of her teacher Lotte Lehmann. Also included are short inteviews with Bumbry
title: Voices of our Time - Grace Bumbry
